welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Okuizumo, Japan! Known for its beautiful nature and rich history, this charming city offers many hidden gems waiting to be discovered. We invite you to explore and experience all that Okuizumo has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Izumo Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of Izumo Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miho Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Miho Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Network name and password can be obtained at the information desk.
